attributes.action: Run an open book policy on revenue raised from the motorist and reinvested in the road network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following on from the road pricing scheme we should force the Government to show us what percentage of the revenue raised from the motorist is reinvested in the road network. If the correct amount is invested in the road network the road pricing scheme should not be going ahead as the road network would be able to cope with the levels of traffic flowing.
